entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%

entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy or local snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:55 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
